resources.string: You must start GPS satellites or wireless networks, then you can come back to set it.
System Location has been closed, Do you want to turn on again?
You need to turn on the system Location first
Tell informations to Somebody pick your phone up
Hello, this is Michaels phone, can you take it to Mandy? Her cell is 12345, thank you very much!
What information you want to tell who pick your phone up?
Pay for your Telecom Operator. It will tell the phone location to your friend.
Need 3G network. The phone location will poll to Facebook Wall.
When you drop your phone and lose it, program will auto-send this SMS
I am Phone Lose Notify, It is #time, My Location is #location,
can you contact my phone owner?
It is a wrong phone number!
Do you want to speak anymore? touch me to set
The period of sending Location by SMS or Facebook.
1.This feature needs to keep 3G network.\n\n2.If you exit or turn off the power when application is sending to Facebook, it WILL NOT send Location!
You have set username and password before, do you want to delete and continue?\n\nNotes: If you has not type any data in programe, It will not auto-send by Facebook!
You can check it on Facebook Wall now!
tell my phone owner and help me back, please!
Context who pick your phone up will read it:
Username and password has been cleaned.
Hey! It is your phone, It was lost!
paste this location and find it out in Google Map!
"Low sensitivity" will hard to detect dropping.
You have already interrup sending phone location, this UI will be close...
Please mail to:\n lp43simon@gmail.com\nI will contact with you!
Action you did has not interrup sending location!\n\nPlease try to move the brick from the top of the Left.
Congratulations!\n\nYou have studied how to interrup sending location!
[You drop Droid] is an application that when you drop your phone will alert you. If you start protecting, it will run in the background.
When you drop your phone, you will see this picture and alert you.
Later, It will send the phone location by SMS or Facebook.(your choice)
If you wish not to send your location, you can move the brick from the top of the Left to interrupt it!
If you have any suggestion for me, please mail to:\n lp43simon@gmail.com \n Thank you for using this program.
